dmca.title: Avatar Financial Complains of Listings Using Content
dmca.body:
Nov 24 04 12:O1p	Outlines West	XXX-XXX-XXXX	p.2

November 23, 2004 FAX #: (XXX) XXX-XXXX
ATTN: User Support, DMCA complaints 
PAGES: 2

Dear Google,

This letter is to file an infringement notification as per your instructions on the page -
http://www.google.com/dmca.html. We are hereby notifying you of the following two pages in your index, which are copyrighted material belonging to our company, Avatar Financial Group, LLC of Seattle, WA.

The pages in question result from a search query for "hard money lenders & bridge loans":

1. www.outsourcing.org/modules/ directory/visit.php/cid/556/lid/674 (result #1)
2. iallset.com/go.php?1=250 (result #5)

Both of these pages are taking both copyrighted text and source code material directly from our website: http://www.avatarfinancial.com/index.php

I have been unable to contact the webmasters or companies responsible for the content of either site, although I have found domain registration records for each that are listed below:

Outsourcing.org -
http://www.networksolutions.com/en_US/whois/results.jhtml;jsessionid=N0SVXSGCDZFOSCWKEAQCFFA?whoistoken=16&_requestid=396818
Registrant Name: [private]
Registrant Organization: [private]
Registrant Street: [private]
Registrant City: Thousand Oaks
Registrant State/Province: CA
Registrant Postal Code: 91320
Registrant Country: US 
Registrant Phone: +1.XXXXXXXXXX

Iallset.com -
http://www.networksolutions.com/en_US/whois/results.jhtml;jsessionid=N0SVXSGCDZFOSCWKEAQCFFA?whoistoken=17&_requestid=396906

Administrative Contact: [private] [private]@mail.com
Cancler
Sovetskaya str., 13
Novosibirsk, None USA 6330090
Russian Federation
XXX XXXX XXXXXX Fax -- XXX XXXX XXXXXX

Nov 24 04 12:01p	Outlines West	XXX-XXX-XXXX	 P.3

We, the Avatar Financial Group, have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. As we are the copyright owner, we can guarantee that this infringement was not authorized.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

You may contact me via the following:
Phone: XXX-XXX-XXXX
Email: [private]@avatarfinancial.com 
Address: Avatar Financial Group 
[private]
Seattle, WA 98121

Please see that this matter is resolved immediately and that the offending pages and sites are no longer in your index. If these pages are affecting the listing of AvatarFinancial.com in your results pages, please see to it that any "duplicate content" penalty is lifted.

Thank you,

[private]
Avatar Financial Group 
www.avatarfinancial.com
